markdownRemark.html:
Developers are inclined to code.

That is why we are paid the big bucks: to produce text files full of variables and functions, right?

Software development is a simple, two-step system:

  1. Product devises feature
  2. Developers ship feature

Developers are eager to ship because shipping is where developers’ value is realized.

After all, leaving the office without having made a commit is a sign of weakness.

1. As a dev, you are inclined to code
    1. Inclined to build, to “deliver value”
    2. Hard to stop organizational momentum when leadership is behind something
    3. Users are waiting for fixes and features
    4. Very very easy to say, “Yes” to everything
2. Takes confidence to say no
